overview: G-Rilla, Monster BCâ€¦call him what you want and he just may call you a thing or two as well! BC has taken the YouShoot oath and agreed to answer everything you have for him about wrestling, the world of Snoop, and just about anything else under the sun! Monster has lots of hilarious tales about his fellow WWE stars and he tells them here.  Get ready to let Monster BC into your home for another YOUSHOOT! Tell ya mamma!
title: YouShoot: Monster BC
